{"id":1003531050,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1690287736,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1003531050/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    double helper(double x, long n){\n     if(n == 0){\n         return 1;\n     }\n     if(n < 0){\n         return 1.0 / helper(x, -n);\n     }\n     if(n % 2 == 1){\n        return x * helper(x * x, (n - 1) / 2);\n     } else {\n        return helper(x * x, n / 2);\n     }\n    }\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        return helper(x * x, static_cast<long>(n));\n       \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
